AT.name: Smash Controller
AT.description: Kein Rumreichen des Controllers mehr! Du sitzt keine Partie bei Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U aus, denn dein Smash Controller verwandelt dein Nintendo 3DS™-System in deinen eigenen Controller für das Spiel. So kannst du auch deine eigenen maßgeschneiderten Kämpfer mitbringen, egal, auf wessen Wii U™-Konsole du spielst! Jedes System der Nintendo 3DS™-Familie kann als Smash Controller benutzt werden. Jeder der bis zu acht Spieler bei Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U kann mit seinem eigenen Nintendo 3DS™-System spielen, alle mit einer Kopie des Smash Controllers oder Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

AU.name: Smash Controller
AU.description: No more passing around controllers! You never have to sit out in a couch session of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U again, as Smash Controller transforms your Nintendo 3DS™ system into your own controller for the game. It also enables you to conveniently bring along your own customized fighters, no matter whose Wii U™ console you're playing on. Any system from the Nintendo 3DS™ family can be used as a Smash Controller. All of the up to eight players in a game of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U can play using their own Nintendo 3DS system, each with a copy of Smash Controller or Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

BG.name: Smash Controller
BG.description: No more passing around controllers! You never have to sit out in a couch session of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U again, as Smash Controller transforms your Nintendo 3DS™ system into your own controller for the game. It also enables you to conveniently bring along your own customized fighters, no matter whose Wii U™ console you're playing on. Any system from the Nintendo 3DS™ family can be used as a Smash Controller. All of the up to eight players in a game of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U can play using their own Nintendo 3DS system, each with a copy of Smash Controller or Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

BE.name: Manette Smash
BE.description: Plus besoin de se faire passer les manettes à tour de rôle ! Vous ne serez jamais mis à l'écart pendant une session de Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U, puisque la manette Smash transforme votre console Nintendo 3DS™ en manette pour la partie. Elle vous permettra également d'emporter vos propres combattants personnalisés quelque soit la console Wii U™ sur laquelle vous jouez. N'importe quelle console de la famille Nintendo 3DS™ peut se transformer en manette Smash. Tous les joueurs d'un jeu Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U, jusqu'à huit en tout, peuvent jouer avec leur propre console Nintendo 3DS, chacune ayant une copie de manette Smash ou Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

ES.name: Mando Smash
ES.description: ¡Olvídate de tener que pasar los mandos! No volverás a sentirte excluido durante una partida de Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U ya que Mando Smash transforma tu consola Nintendo 3DS™ en tu propio mando para el juego. Además, te permite utilizar a tus propios luchadores personalizados, independientemente de la consola Wii U™ con la que estés jugando. Se puede utilizar cualquier consola de la familia Nintendo 3DS™ como Mando Smash. Todos los jugadores (hasta un máximo de ocho) pueden jugar a Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U con sus propias consolas Nintendo 3DS, cada uno con una copia de Mando Smash o de Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

IT.name: Smash Controller
IT.description: Niente più passaggi di controller! Non rimarrai più escluso durante una partita tra amici a Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U, poiché Smash Controller trasforma la tua console Nintendo 3DS™ in un controller per questo gioco. Ti permetterà inoltre di usare i tuoi lottatori personalizzati, qualunque sia la console Wii U™ su cui stai giocando. È possibile usare qualsiasi console della famiglia Nintendo 3DS™ come Smash Controller. Tutti i giocatori (fino a otto) di Super Smash Bros™ for Wii U possono giocare usando la loro console Nintendo 3DS, ognuno con una copia di Smash Controller o di Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

NL.name: Smash-controller
NL.description: Het is niet langer nodig om de controller door te geven! Je hoeft nooit meer op je beurt te wachten als je met anderen een potje Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U speelt, doordat Smash-controller van je Nintendo 3DS™-systeem een controller voor het spel maakt. Het geeft je ook de mogelijkheid om moeiteloos je eigen aangepaste vechters mee te nemen, ongeacht op welke Wii U™-console je speelt. Alle systemen in de Nintendo 3DS™-familie kunnen als Smash-controller gebruikt worden. Iedere speler, van de maximaal acht spelers, kan in een potje Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U spelen met gebruik van hun eigen Nintendo 3DS-systeem. Iedere speler heeft een exemplaar van Smash-controller of Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS nodig.

NZ.name: Smash Controller
NZ.description: No more passing around controllers! You never have to sit out in a couch session of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U again, as Smash Controller transforms your Nintendo 3DS™ system into your own controller for the game. It also enables you to conveniently bring along your own customized fighters, no matter whose Wii U™ console you're playing on. Any system from the Nintendo 3DS™ family can be used as a Smash Controller. All of the up to eight players in a game of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U can play using their own Nintendo 3DS system, each with a copy of Smash Controller or Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

PL.name: Smash Controller
PL.description: No more passing around controllers! You never have to sit out in a couch session of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U again, as Smash Controller transforms your Nintendo 3DS™ system into your own controller for the game. It also enables you to conveniently bring along your own customized fighters, no matter whose Wii U™ console you're playing on. Any system from the Nintendo 3DS™ family can be used as a Smash Controller. All of the up to eight players in a game of Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U can play using their own Nintendo 3DS system, each with a copy of Smash Controller or Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

PT.name: Comando Smash
PT.description: Não é preciso passar os comandos de mão em mão! Já não tens de ficar de fora quando estiveres a jogar uma sessão de Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U no sofá, porque o Comando Smash transforma a tua Consola Nintendo 3DS™ no teu próprio comando para o jogo. Também te permite usares os teus lutadores personalizados, independentemente da consola Wii U™ em que estejas a jogar. Qualquer consola da família Nintendo 3DS™ pode ser usada como um Comando Smash. Todos os jogadores, até um máximo de oito, podem jogar Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U com as suas próprias Consolas Nintendo 3DS, cada um com uma cópia de Comando Smash ou Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.

RU.name: Контроллер Smash
RU.description: Забудьте о необходимости передавать контроллер по кругу! Вам больше не придется просиживать на диване, дожидаясь вашей очереди сразиться в Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U, так как Контроллер Smash поможет превратить в контроллер вашу систему Nintendo 3DS™. Вы также сможете импортировать ваших бойцов, неважно на чьей системе Wii U™ вы играете. Любая система из серии Nintendo 3DS™ может быть использована как Контроллер Smash. До восьми игроков могут играть в Super Smash Bros.™ for Wii U одновременно, используя свои системы Nintendo 3DS с экземпляром Контроллер Smash или Super Smash Bros.™ for Nintendo 3DS.
